Description: Three broken pieces of cast ring made of iron; although part of setting remains, it is difficult to determine its shape, perhaps an even diamond with one side broken; highly corroded.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Redpath Museum, Montreal. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
2.70 width- portion with setting/ 2.00 H setting/ 0.80 th. Setting/ 1.60 width of second piece/ 0.60 th. Of second piece/ 1.10 width of 3rd piece/ 0.70 thick of 3rd piece.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (QA.26) (Phase 3)
